name: Tales of the Lab DOWNLOAD LINKS
name_original: Tales of the Lab DOWNLOAD LINKS
description:
To play the game, download the same file type as your OPERATING SYSTEM.
(example: if you have a Windows computer, download the Windows Tales of the Lab copy.)

Next, When the zipped file is downloaded, open the zipped file, and extract the "Transfur Adventure" game file.

Now, open the TRANSFUR ADVENTURE game file, and select "Game"
